    background: none !important;
    border-radius: 3px !important;
}
.SearchBox-option[data-active=true] {
      background: #444 !important;
      box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px #fff !important;
}

.SearchBox-optionTab {
    height: 30px !important;
    padding: 4px !important;
    background-color: #000000 !important;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px #666 !important;
}

input.SearchBox-query {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px #353535 !important;
}
.SearchBox-submit:after {
    -webkit-filter: invert(100%); /* Safari */
    filter: invert(100%);
}
span.SearchBox-submit {
    margin: 0px 0px 0px -2px;
    border-radius: 0 0 5px 0;
}
